title: I have a code for a free ''Dreadknight Garen'' Skin
body: And I am unable to redeem it, everytime I try I get the same error message. ''There was a problem fulfilling your store items, please try again'' is it just not available right now or is the even over? it says the code expires in December 2017. Please help, Ive been playing garen for my first few matches and I would like to equip a skin for him! :){{champion:86}}

replies.body: No worries, we can help!  Reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and a specialist can assist you directly with this.  :D
send a ticket to the lol support they unlock it on your account then :) i had the same problem
